body:
Your solution is nearly the same as my sample code (my sample code works fine).
My original issue is that, this way cannot work in my produce code, but works with the sample code.
What I mean ask for a feature, is make it more easier to do this kinda things by making it a parameter of nn.dynamic_rnn function "init_state_trainable: bool"
